attributes.action: evaluate the cost and effectiveness  of current UK Drug laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Transform recently did a cost-benefit of UK drug laws, and gave a very conservative figure on how much this war on drugs is actually costing the UK a staggering £14 billion a year.  I would like the Government to look into the (in)effectiveness of the current laws and look at the alternatives including legalisation and taxation, using EXPERT advice not outdated moral arguments, so that tax payers money is best used and not totally wasted as it is currently.
